context: Good afternoon! I'm good, I hope you are as well. What kind of movies are you looking for?
I am, thank you. I love animated movies like Lilo & Stitch or Finding Dory (2016) Oh, I also loved Inside Out (2015) that was such a great concept.
resp: Those are great! How about one of the older movies for a change? Like Cats Don't Dance (1997) . Scott Bakula singing and dancing as a cat. Can't beat it.
